description: Olay Moisturising Lotion Sensitive with coconut & castor seed oil offers all day hydration.  This lotion is formulated with ingredients to help improve and maintain youthful looking skin.Its formula:- Is designed to be light. non-greasy and quickly absorbed into skin.- Quickly replenishes essential moisture. - Is dermatologist tested. - Does not have fragrance & colorants.Results:Olay moisturising lotion has been shown to: - Significantly boost skin hydration.- Leave skin soft and smooth.Olay moisturising lotion is part of the special care range. For younger looking skin, also use:- Olay cleanser. - Olay purifying toner. Light & non-greasy.  Formulated specifically for sensitive, delicate skin, Olay Moisturising Lotion actively hydrates and maintains the skin's natural moisture balance.  Olay Moisturising Lotion for Sensitive Skin is dermatologically tested, hypo-allergenic, colour and fragrance free.  Non-greasy and fast absorbing.
name: Olay Moisturising Lotion For Sensitive Skin 150ml
